bug.author: bryanhaiphanthanh
bug.summary: Terminal is hung during API processing
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Hung terminal after running INDEX_SETTINGS=sports/index.yml API_CLASS=tldrstory.api.API uvicorn "txtai.api:app" <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
This was run on macOS.
Install wget via homebrew brew install wget Run the commands from readme.md from https://github.com/neuml/tldrstory
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
As shown in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/neuml/tldrstory>https://github.com/neuml/tldrstory</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Everything from 1. Download the “Sports News” application configuration to 2. Start the indexing process works as expected. Terminal is hung after 3, I can type, enter commands, but the process is stuck on step 3. Start the API process. Log is attached below. Note that step 1 and 2 has been run before: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/streamlit/streamlit/files/5460810/bugreport1.txt>bugreport1.txt</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
No <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: Streamlit, version 0.69.2 Python version: Python 3.7.4 Using Conda: Conda OS version: macOS Catalina version 10.15.6 (19G2021) Browser version: Version 86.0.4240.80 (Official Build) (x86_64)
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
If needed, add any other context about the problem here. For example, did this bug come from <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io>https://discuss.streamlit.io</denchmark-link> or another site? Link the original source here!
